activities:
Locus Technology, Inc. (Locus) may collect personal data from clients or "interested parties" including name, telephone number and email address through information requests, during the course of doing business with a company and at industry trade shows. 
Locus uses personal data to provide product information, deliver products, enable services, provide support and for client accounting purposes.
personaldata: Personal  data about the organization, clients and visitors is covered. Data covered includes manually processed data.
